detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sturdy, printed jersey with a round neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and ribbed hems. Legs with reversible sequin side stripes (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y).
Short skirt in jersey with a shimmering pattern. High waist, a concealed zip at the back and frills down the front. Lined.
Short, wide, pleated skirt in a textured weave with vertical fringing. High waist with a smooth, extended waistband, and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Lined.
High-waisted trousers in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and wide, gently rounded legs that taper at the hems.
Lace trousers with covered elastication at the waist and wide legs with scalloped hems. Jersey lining.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem.

Patterned set with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts. The top has a wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication, and decorative ties at the hem. Wide shorts with covered elastication at the waist.

Patterned set with a short-sleeved top and pair of shorts. The top has a wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication, and decorative ties at the hem. Wide shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with a loop front and back, and textured soles.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with a loop front and back, and textured soles.
Short, high-waisted skirt in woven fabric containing glittery threads. Double-layered waistband, a concealed zip and button in one side, and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a decorative tie detail at the front. Leggings with an elasticated waistband.
Short-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a decorative tie detail at the front. Leggings with an elasticated waistband.

Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with print motifs on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and a print motif.

Set with a long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with print motifs on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and a print motif.

Straight-cut, double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with wide notch lapels, side pockets, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Lined.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a resort collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small, decorative metal pendant.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one with a small, decorative metal pendant.

Knitted bucket hat with a soft, fluffy finish. Width of brim 5.5 cm.

Cold shoulder jumpsuit in cotton seersucker with elastication and a flounce at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Diagonal side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.

Shirt in soft Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Biker jacket in soft suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with concealed press-studs. Zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets, one inner pocket and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with rib-knit sections and long raglan sleeves. No buttons.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Jacket in a felted Italian wool blend with notch lapels, a loose yoke at the back, long raglan sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and front pockets. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to add width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to add width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.
Utility shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Utility shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with slightly worn details. Collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. Soft faux shearling lining.

Top in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated trim around the collar, cuffs and hem.

Dog duffle coat in a felted weave with a foldover collar and hole for a leash at the back of the neck. Decorative wind flap and buttons, and decorative flap pockets at the top, and two hook and loop fasteners underneath. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs to help keep the coat in place. Lined.
Chelsea boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles in a contrasting colour with a low heel.
Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes and covered block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Sandals with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a round metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Sandals with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a round metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Loafers in imitation leather with a chunky metal chain and fringes at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.
Mules in imitation suede with pointed toes and a decorative strap over the foot with sparkly stones. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
